title: "Quality assessment"

## Prompt for the basic evaluation of the methodological approach

- Text analysis and recommendations
- Zero-shot prompting
- LLMs with file upload and large context window (> 100,000 tokens)
- Upload a paper (PDF) 7

```Markdown
Your task is to analyze the provided research study and identify its
study design (e.g., experiment, case study, survey, archival study),
sample size, data collection methods, and statistical analyses.
Present these four characteristics in a Markdown table.
```
